title: Riot Games Pleaseee
body:
Today I was going to buy Jhin as my champion but I accidentally  bought zed
Can I please get a refund

Zed 6300 ip 


I used all of my 3 tokens
I really want my ip back :l

replies.body:
Every summoner is given 3 refund tokens so that they can refund champions they no longer like or if they accidentally purchased the wrong skin. Since you've already used all of your tokens, we won't be able to help much with this. I like to suggest that people watch the champion spotlight or wait until they are in the free champion rotation if you're unsure whether you'll like new champions.

Once your refund tokens are used, we aren't able to give extras, which is also covered in our [Content Refund FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).
